item.description: Want to host an outdoor party (indoor if it's raining)... August 18th, Saturday starting at 4 and going into the night. Bring games, be prepared for badminton and/or volley ball, croquet? BYOB AND BYOF (FOOD)... Happy to turn on the grill... I think there could be a meteor shower at night too, and of course there's always the campfire!  This is a mulit-group event so there will be others coming from other groups as well.  Fun!

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: BBQ, badminton, ping pong, volleyball, games at Marion's
